title: Ambient Video Game Music - Japan 3
description: Dive into the enchanting realm of Japan with our latest collection, "Japan Ambience 3". This meticulously curated selection of 10 ambient music tracks captures the very essence of the Land of the Rising Sun.
longDescription:
Dive into the enchanting realm of Japan with our latest collection, "Japan Ambience 3". This meticulously curated selection of 10 ambient music tracks captures the very essence of the Land of the Rising Sun. Drawing inspiration from traditional Japanese melodies, each composition seamlessly blends the serene sounds of rain, wind, and rivers to transport listeners to ancient temples, tranquil gardens, and mist-laden mountains.


This third instalment continues our commitment to providing game developers with rich auditory experiences, enhancing gameplay and fostering deep player immersion. Whether you're creating a tranquil village setting, an atmospheric puzzle segment, or a meditative in-game moment, these tracks will add depth and authenticity to your projects.


Features:


10 high-quality ambient tracks, each with its own unique flavour of Japan.

Natural soundscapes that evoke the beauty of Japan's seasons and landscapes.

Perfect for setting mood and ambiance in various game scenarios.

Easy integration with multiple game development platforms.


Elevate your game's soundscape to new heights with "Japan Ambience 3" and let the magic of Japan resonate with every player.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CKaMm5wHII4

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0pwwZpbWnQY

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wvl8vahdtCk


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (No)

Number of tracks: 10

Number of cues: 10

Minutes of audio provided: 30 Minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
